sentences.sContent: I mean really, once they eliminated the choking hazard, it was all downhill for me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I mean really, once they eliminated the choking hazard, it was all downhill for me.
sentences.sCn: 我是说真的，一旦他们消除了窒息的危险，那就都是我要走的下坡路。

sentences.sContent: At that time our relations were going upwards, but since then they have been going downwards [downhill].
sentences.sContent_eng: At that time our relations were going upwards, but since then they have been going downwards [downhill].
sentences.sCn: 那时我们的关系是走上坡路, 此后就开始走下坡路了。
